segment.source: When your game has focus, you must handle every event in the message queue as it arrives, and so you must call CoreWindowDispatch.ProcessEvents with the ProcessAllIfPresent option.

segment.source: So your game must use ProcessOneAndAllPending, which blocks until it gets an event, and then processes that event and any others that arrive in the process queue during the processing of the first.
